Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the situation by stating that the SP was suspended solely because the Chief Minister was upset at the killing of Burhan Wani.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide any evidence or sources to support the assertion that the SP was suspended.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the suspension of the SP was due to the Chief Minister's reaction, without providing any evidence or alternative explanations.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider any alternative explanations for the alleged suspension of the SP.
